comments.body: How come this needs to be duplicated? Import cycle?

> How come this needs to be duplicated? Import cycle?

Yeah, the authenticator shouldn't import an impl.
Can we add a bool or an enum and make this in ApplyTo? I'd like to keep these options structs serializable and deep equatable if possible.

> Can we add a bool or an enum and make this in ApplyTo? I'd like to keep these options structs serializable and deep equatable if possible.

The end goal is to wire up to a configmap which has no logical ClientCA and would use a client which cannot be serialized.
To add some more clarity, this instance is an intermediate form that is embedded into non-serializeable structs.  This is not the struct that we serialize for config or directly wire options against.
Yes, you're right. I thought this was Options for some reason.
